articles.description: Hero Xtreme 160R is more affordable than the Bajaj Pulsar NS160, and it also offers more features. The Pulsar is more powerful, but it is also heavier.
articles.content:
2023 Bajaj Pulsar NS160 vs Hero Xtreme 160R: Looks
While both motorcycles are naked streetfighters, it is the Pulsar NS160 with a more aggressive look and stance. However, the design of the Pulsar N… [+1913 chars]

articles.title: Mutual fund nomination deadline of March 31 extended; check details - Economic Times
articles.description: The deadline for submitting nomination details has been extended for mutual fund investors from March 31, 2023, to September 30, 2023.
articles.content: The last date for mutual funds investors to specify nominee details has been extended to September 30, 2023. Earlier the deadline was March 31, 2023. Through a circular on March 28, 2023, the Securit… [+3121 chars]

articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.title: Sensex ends flat after choppy session, Nifty near 16,950 - Economic Times
articles.description: The 30-share BSE benchmark Sensex declined 40 points or 0.07% to settle at 57,613. The broader NSE Nifty dropped 34 points or 0.20% to end at 16,952.
articles.content: Defying positive cues from global peers, benchmark equity indices closed marginally lower on Tuesday in a volatile market, dragged by IT and auto stocks.The 30-share BSE benchmark Sensex declined 40 … [+3307 chars]

articles.author: Tanmay Tiwary
articles.title: Reliance, Tata Power and JSW Energy among 11 companies to get solar cell manufacturing approval - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The Central government revealed that the second tranche is expected to bring in an investment of Rs 93,041 crore, and will also generate a total of 1,01,487 jobs. Of the 1,01,487 jobs, 35,010 will get direct employment and 66,477 will be indirectly employed.
